articles.author: Katy Evans
articles.title: This Is Your Last Chance To See Green Comet Nishimura For Another 400 Years - IFLScience
articles.description: The comet is having its last hurrah as it makes its way to the outer reaches of the Solar System and out of sight in our lifetime.
articles.content: The recently discovered green comet Nishimura survived its recent closest pass to the Sun, which is good for the comet but bad for us. It means soon we wont be able to see it and it wont come around … [+1874 chars]

articles.title: AlphaFold touted as next big thing for drug discovery — but is it? - Nature.com
articles.description: Questions remain about whether the AI tool for predicting protein structures can really shake up the pharmaceutical industry.

articles.title: Estimates of water ice on the Moon get a 'dramatic' downgrade – Physics World - physicsworld.com
articles.description: The lunar surface contains much less ice than was previously expected, though deposits are widespread
articles.content: A shadowy harbour: Because the Sun strikes the Moon at such a low angle at its poles, sunlight never reaches the floors of some deep craters. These permanently shadowed regions trap volatile chemical… [+5043 chars]
